Lde/ecspride/Exceptions1;->onCreate:(Lan: The method Lde/ecspride/Exceptions1;->onCreate:(Landroid/os/Bundle;)V originates sensitive data by calling the getDeviceId() method from TelephonyManager. This device ID is stored in register v3 and then passed to the sendTextMessage method of SmsManager, which is a sink for this sensitive data.
